titles.title: I Would Have A Part With Thee

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I would have a part with Thee,
Precious Lord, wash over me.
Wash away all the stains,
Till in my heart
Your love reigns.
Wash over me. (4x)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Water of life, make me clean,
In Your sight.
Remove the stain of the past,
Clean and fresh I'll be at last!
Wash over me. (4x)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Quiero tener mi parte contigo.
Lava me señor precioso.
Quita toda manchada en mí,
Que en mi corazón tu reines, si.
Lava me, si, lava me.
Lava me, si, lava me,
En agua de vida.
Has me limpio a tu vista.
Quita todo lo pasado,
Y al final yo seré purificado.
Lava me, si, lava me.
Lava me, si, lava me.
Lava me, si, lava me.
Lava me, si, lava me.
